What’s new?

NIRF 2024 Rankings are out. As per the latest NIRF 2024 rankings, Galgotias University ranks #98 under the category 'Management'.

The MAT 2025 registration process for the Feb session is ongoing for CBT, and the last date to apply is Mar 12, 2025. Further, the MAT 2025 PBT and CBT will be held on Mar 9 and Mar 23, 2025, respectively.

A few more updates are given below:

  • The CMAT 2025 result has been released for admission to the MBA, PGDM, and MMS courses. Registered candidates can log in and check or download their scorecards from the official website.
  • The CUET UG registration 2025 is open for admission to UG courses, and the last date to register is Mar 22, 2025. Additionally, the CUET UG 2025 exam will be conducted tentatively between May 8 and Jun 1, 2025.
  • The CAT 2024 result has been declared for admission to the MBA/PGDM courses. Candidates can log in and download their scorecards on the official website.
  • The NMAT 2024 Phase 2 exams are now ended for admission to MBA/PGDM courses for the academic session 2025-27.
  • The LSAT India 2025 exam has been discontinued and will not be conducted from 2025 onwards for admission to 3-year LLB, 5-year Integrated LLB, and LLM courses.
  • The CLAT 2025 counselling process has been delayed for admission to the 5-year Integrated LLB (UG) and one-year LLM (PG) courses. The revised schedule is yet to be released.
  • The CUET PG 2025 exam dates have been revised for admission to PG courses. As per the notification, the exam is scheduled to be held between Mar 13, 2025, and Apr 1, 2025.

Galgotias University Greater Noida Highlights 2025

Galgotias University is a private university that was established in 2011. Galgotias University is located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh and is recognised by the UGC. Galgotias University Noida is approved by the PCI, BCI, INC, COA, NCTE, and NCHM. Galgotias University has been ranked 98 in Management and 50 in Pharmacy by NIRF 2024. Galgotias University's ranking showed an increasing trend when compared with the previous year. Galgotias University Uttar Pradesh offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma, Integrated, and Doctoral programmes. The flagship courses offered at GCET Greater Noida are BTech, BBA, BSc, BCA, and MBA. Galgotias University Greater Noida fees range from INR 5,000 to INR 6 lakh.

Galgotias University Greater Noida course admission is based on entrance exam or merit. The university accepts admission through the national entrance exams such as JEE Main, CLAT, LSAT, CAT, CMAT, NMAT, and others. Galgotias admission process is online. During Galgotias University placement, a placement of 98% was recorded. The university appoints experienced and trained faculty members with years of experience. Galgotia Greater Noida has spectacular infrastructure which includes A/C classrooms, a library, labs, a conference hall, a Wi-Fi facility, a hostel, and others. Below are some of the major highlights of Galgotias University:

Commonly asked questions
On Highlights

Q:   How can I get admission in Galgotias University for MBA?

A: 

Admission to MBA at Galgotias University is based on scores obtained in various national-level entrance exams. Candidates seeking admission to this course must qualify for any one of the following entrance exams:

  • MAT
  • CAT
  • NMAT
  • CMAT
  • CUET-PG

Further, a counselling process will be conducted at the university for the final seat allotment. Candidates whose names appeared on the merit list have to pay a certain amount of fee to lock their seat. In case, the seats get filled or students are found non-eligible for the course, the admission counsellor will interview the candidate for the second attempt. However, this information is based on unofficial sources. Candidates are advised to get clarity from the official website or the admission office of Galgotias University.

Upvote

Q:   Does Galgotias University accept 12th marks?

A: 

Yes, Galgotias University inducts candidates for the majority of its courses based on marks in the qualifying examinations. For admission to the UG programmes across various specialisations at Galgotias University candidates will get selected based on their marks in class 12 as the qualifying examination for UG courses is class 12. Hence, candidates seeking admission to the UG courses at Galgotias University must have valid marks in class 12.

For admission to BTech and BA LLB, candidates are also selected based on their scores in JEE-Main and CLAT, respectively. Therefore, candidates based on their marks in class 12 or the required entrance examination will be selected for further admission rounds followed by document verification and fee payment leading to final seat allotment.

Upvote

Q:   What is the fees for the BTech course at Galgotias University?

A: 

The total tuition fee for the BTech course at Galgotias University ranges from INR 1.40 lakh to INR 6 lakh. The duration of the course is between 3-5 years. The university usually conducts GEEE to shortlist candidates for the BTech programme. Candidates who have passed UPSEE/ JEE Main can also apply. Find below the eligibility and selection criteria for BTech courses:

  • Selection criteria: Merit-based
  • Eligibility for BTech/ BTech (Hons): A pass in Class 12 with a minimum of 60% aggregate in Physics/ Chemistry/ Mathematics.
  • Eligibility for BTech in Agriculture Engineering: A pass in Class 12 in PCM/ PCB with at least 60% aggregate.
Upvote

Q:   Is Galgotias University good for placements?

A: 

The Galgotia University Greater Noida offers good annual placements for various courses like BTech, MBA, MCA, etc. In 2023, over 580 recruiters offered job opportunities. The highest package and average package stood at INR 1.50 crore per annum and INR 5.25 LPA, respectively. Additionally, 32% of offers were multiple job opportunities. The top recruiters of Galgotias University placements 2023 included Microsoft, Amazon, American Express, Commvault, and many other renowned companies.

Upvote

Q:   What are the perks of studying at Galgotias University?

A: 

Galgotias University offers a good campus life. Galgotias University campus sprawls over an area of 52 acres. The state-of-the-art campus has been designed by renowned architects specialising in educational architecture. The university has laboratories, classrooms, a library, hostels, and cafeterias. The infrastructure of Galgotias University has been given 3.9 stars by more than 1,000 Shiksha-verified students. According to the reviews, it can be said that the university helps with overall development.

Upvote

Candidates need to fulfil the basic eligibility criteria to be able to apply for the courses. Galgotias University eligibility varies from course to course. The university offers Btech specialisation in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Bio-Medical, and others. Galgotia University Greater Noida BTech fee ranges from INR 1.6 lakh to INR 6 lakh. The university also offers MBA specialisation in Financial, Aviation, Tourism & Travel, Fintech, and others. Galgotias University Greater Noida Application Process

Galgotias University Uttar Pradesh application window is open. Candidates need to apply for various courses on the official website. Candidates can check out the step-by-step application process below:

Step 1: Visit the official website galgotiasuniversity.edu.in.

Step 2: Click on the 'Apply Now' tab on the home page.

Step 3: Fill out the application form with all the necessary details such as Name, Email, Mobile Number, Preferred Course, etc.

Step 4: Pay the application fee of INR 1200.

Step 5: Candidate receives application confirmation through Email/ SMS.

Galgotias University Greater Noida: How to Reach?

To reach Galgotias University, located in Greater Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India, you can follow these general directions The nearest airport is the Indira Gandhi International Airport (DEL) in New Delhi, which is approximately 60 kilometers away from the university. From the airport, you can take a taxi or use app-based cab services to reach Galgotias University. The nearest railway station is the Ghaziabad Railway Station, which is about 30 kilometers away from the university. From the railway station, you can take a taxi or use public transportation to reach Galgotias University. Galgotias University is well-connected by road. You can take a taxi, or auto-rickshaw, or use app-based cab services to reach the university. The university is located near the Yamuna Expressway, making it easily accessible from various parts of Delhi-NCR. It's advisable to check the current transportation options and routes, as they may vary.
